Texts.Chs: 随着你试验的进展与设备的更新，你将在纳米加工器中解锁^orange;各种实用装备^reset;。将它们挨个尝试吧～
Texts.Eng: As you experiment and research new stuff, you'll unlock ^green;all sorts^reset; of useful stuff to make in the Nanofabricator! Try it all out as you go!

Texts.Chs: ^orange;纳米加工器^reset;是极其实用的设备。它可以用于制造各种^orange;升级装置，插件^reset;等等。尝试在纳米加工器里制造一个^orange;呼吸器 EPP 模块^reset;吧。
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Nanofabricator^reset; is an extrmely useful device. It can be used to fashion ^orange;upgrades, augments, techs^reset; and more. Try making a ^orange;re-breather augment^reset; in yours.
